column3: aber a ahemfo a wɔwɔ Jordan egya
column6: nye po kɛse no no mpoano nyinara wɔ Lebanon tsentsendo no
column12: nye Jebusfo no tsee dza esi no;"

column3: dɛ wɔreyɛ kor

column2: "Na aber a Gibeonfo tsee dza Josua dze yɛɛ Jeriko nye Ai no
column6: na wosii mu kɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ gyama wɔyɛ abɔfo
column7: na wɔfaa nkotoku dadaw soasoaa hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ
column8: nye nsanwoma nkotoku a wɔayɛ dadaw na wɔatsetsew na wɔapempam;"

column2: "na mpaboa dadaw pokyipokyi a wɔasesa mu hyehyɛɛ hɔn anan
column3: na ntar gow hyehyɛe; nna hɔn edzidzidze mu edziban nyinara atwentwem na wɔabobɔ etur."

column2: "Na wosii mu kɔr Josua hɔ wɔ nsera mu wɔ Gilgal
column3: na wɔsee ɔno nye Israelmba no dɛ
column4: Yefi ekyirekyir ɔman bi mu na yɛaba
column5: dɛm ntsi afei hom nye hɛn nyɛ apam."

column2: "Na Israelmba no see Hivifo no dɛ
column3: Annyɛ a hɛn mu na hom tse; na yɛbɛyɛ dɛn yɛnye hom ayɛ apam?"
Yɛyɛ wo nkowaa. Na Josua bisaa hɔn dɛ
column4: Woananom nye hom? Na hom fi hen bae?"

column3: EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne dzin ntsi na wo nkowaa fi ekyirekyir ɔman bi mu aba: na yɛatse ne nka
column4: na dza ɔyɛe wɔ Egypt nyinara
column6: "na dza ɔdze yɛɛ Amorifo ahemfo beenu a wɔwɔ Jordan egya
column8: nye Basanhen Ɔge a ɔwɔ Astarot no nyinara."

column2: "Na hɛn mpanyimfo nye hɛn man mu nkorɔfo nyinara kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ
column3: Hom mfa ɔkwan do edzidzidze
column6: Yɛyɛ hom nkowaa: na afei hom nye hɛn nyɛ apam."

column2: "Hɛn boodoo yi da a yefiir edzi dɛ yɛreba hom nkyɛn no na yɛfaa no ɔhyew totoo hɛn edzidzidze mu; na afei
column3: hwɛ

column2: "na nsanwoma nkotoku yi a yɛhyehyɛɛ no amaama yi
column3: wɔyɛ afofor; na
column5: wɔatsetsew; na hɛn ntar nye hɛn mpaboa yi ayɛ adadaw wɔ ɔkwan no no war a ɔwar dodow ntsi."

column2: "Na mbarimba no gyee hɔn edzidzidze no bi
column3: naaso woemmbisa EWURADZE hɔ apam."

column2: "Na Josua nye hɔn dzii no asomdwee mu
column3: na ɔnye hɔn yɛɛ apam dɛ ɔbɛma wɔatsena ase: na hɔn mu mbapɔmba no dzidzii nsew kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔnye hɔn wiee apam no yɛ no n'ekyir nda ebiasa
column3: nna wɔtsee dɛ wɔyɛ hɔn manmufo
na wokodur hɔn nkurow mu da a otsia ebiasa no. Na hɔn nkurow nye Gibeon
osiandɛ hɔn mu mbapɔmba no dze EWURADZE
column5: edzi nsew akyerɛ hɔn. Na dɔm no nyinara hwinhwinii tsiaa mbapɔmba no."

column2: "Na mbapɔmba no nyinara see dɔm no nyinara dɛ
column3: Yɛdze EWURADZE
column5: edzi nsew akyerɛ hɔn: dɛm ntsi afei yennyi ho kwan dɛ yɛdze nsa ka hɔn."

column3: na yɛama wɔatsena ase; amma osian ntam a yɛaka akyerɛ hɔn no ntsi
Wɔmma wɔntsena ase: mbom wɔbɛyɛ nduatwafo nye nsusawfo ama hɛn. Dɛm na mbapɔmba no kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn."
na obisaa hɔn
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom adaadaa hɛn
column7: Yɛnye hom ntamu twe dodoodow; aber a hom tse hɛn mu yi?"

column3: na hom nnkegyaa nkowaa yɛ ara da
column4: hom bɛyɛ nduatwafo nye nsusawfo ama me Nyankopɔn fie."

column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ wɔkaa no kotoo kyerɛɛ wo nkowaa
column5: mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn sii na ɔhyɛɛ n'akowaa Moses dɛ ɔmfa asaase nyinara mma hom
column6: na ɔnsɛɛ asaase no do atsefo no nyinara mfi hom enyim; dɛm ntsi osian hom ntsi yesuroo dodoodow maa hɛn nkwa
column7: iyi ntsi na yɛayɛ dɛm yi."

column3: hwɛ
column4: yɛwɔ wo nsamu: dza ehwɛ a oye na ɔtsen ma wo dɛ edze bɛyɛ hɛn no

column3: na ɔgyee hɔn fii Israelmba nsamu

column2: "Na da no ara Josua yɛɛ hɔn nduatwafo nye nsusawfo dze maa Israelmba no
column3: nye EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia no
column4: wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi biara. Na dɛm na wɔyɛɛ dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
